form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title of the image, Application for Adjustment of Status, Form number, I-4526

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 10. WHAT CONTINUING TIES HAVE YOU MAI ED WITH THE UNITED STATES? WHAT EFFORTS HAVE a MADE TO AVOID ABANDONING YOUR PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS IN THE UNITED STATES? 9 have been in constant touch with both of my sons indicating my desire to come to the United States. I have got my lost passport replaced and I have also applied to get my Alien Registration Card replaced as of 6/6/94. 11. REASONS FOR NOT RETURNING TO THE UNITED STATES UNTIL TIME OF THIS APPLICATION 1. in passport in lieu of lost Delay issuance of new my passport. 2. Sickness leading to death of my wife (on 11/29/94) since April 1994. 12. LIST BELOW ALL PERIODS THAT YOU HAVE LIVED ABROAD FOR SIX MONTHS OR LONGER SINCE YOUR INITIAL ENTRY INTO THE UNITED STATES AS A PERMA- NENT RESIDENT DATES (FROM TO) COUNTRY 6/27/93 to Present India 13. HAVE YOU BEEN EMPLOYED ABROAD? YES NO If the following: EMPLOYER ADDRESS TO 14. I WISH TO RETURN TO THE UNITED ABOUT 12/29/94 (Date) 15. I swear or affirm that all statements which appear on this application are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief. I understand that any false or misleading statement or willful concealment of a material fact may subject me to permanent exclusion from the United States. I understand that if this application for special immigrant status is approved, I must apply for an immigrant visa within six months from the date of approval. N.D. She. 12/7/94 Signature of Applicant Date DO NOT WRITE IN THIS SPACE - OFFICIAL USE ONLY Approved 101(a)(27)(A) Disapproved 20MAR 92 Visas Kangaroo proof of cit 25JUNE 93 Returned to India Reason: I- Thurs, - go to lobby proof ofrel. 20 Aer gy passport expired as what in's shows 12/7/94 Al: Ne-Delhi Signature of Consular Officer Date Post REVIEWED: Concur Do NOT Concur Signature of Reviewing Officer Date
